name: Paper Flipper
description:
This game is about the "PAPER FLIPPER" travveling through a sketchbook. You have 8 different levels to platform though to gat to the end of the sketch book.

Controls-

A/D/Left/Right- Movement

W/Space - Jump

Enter - Pause

E - Flip

Credits-

Alfie Simpson - Games design/Project leader

Tobias Jacklin - Voice actor/Asset Designer

Jack Smith - Level Designer

Veronica Smith - Asset Designer/Character Animator
